name: EUROS / AGENCY
goal:
Created in 2012, Euros / Agency helps the management of public and private organizations to define and implement communication and influence strategies.

Based in Brussels and Paris, we offer the same expertise at European and national levels, as well as on missions which require a joint understanding of the two environments.

We work on all aspects of corporate communication and brand reputation, as well as political counsel and public affairs thanks to high end services.

**

Créée en 2012, Euros / Agency accompagne les dirigeants des organisations publiques et privées dans la définition et la mise en œuvre de leurs stratégies de communication et d’influence.

Basée à Bruxelles et Paris, l’agence intervient sur des missions européenne, nationale ou nécessitant une compréhension des deux environnements.

Nos champs d’interventions recouvrent tous les aspects de la communication corporate et de la réputation de marque, du conseil politique et des affaires publiques à travers des accompagnements haut de gamme.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
